description:
No more worrying about dimming your screen or finding an outlet. From off-the-grid, to on-the-go, the Venture 35 is a rugged powerbank that will keep your devices charged.

  • Works with your favourite USB powered devices: smartphone 2-3 charges, POV camera 5 charges, headlamp 5-10 charges, tablet one full charge
  • Pass-through charging lets you charge your device while the Venture is being charged
  • Charge time is about 3 hours from a USB-C PD port or 4 hours from a USB-A port
  • Input/output: USB type-C 5-12V, up to 3A (18W max) regulated, output: USB A 5V, up to 3A (15W max) regulated
  • Lithium nickel manganese cobalt oxide offer lower energy density, but longer lives and inherent safety
  • IP67 weather protection for torrential rain or the occasional dust storm
  • 50 lumen flashlight adds versatility on days that run long
  • During storage you can keep your Venture powerbank plugged into a power source, or fully charge the powerbank every 3-6 months and store in a cool, dry place
  • In the box: Venture powerbank and a USB type-A to USB type-C cable (25cm)
name: Goal Zero Venture 35 Waterproof Power Bank
